thread.title: The road to the Masters is lined with... cigars and Hooters?

title: The road to the Masters is lined with... cigars and Hooters?
text:
The road to the Masters is lined with... cigars and Hooters? 7:09am BST - 01:26 
On the fringes of the Masters' pristine greens lie a sort of 'Turkish bazaar' where folks peddle everything from cigars to children's books, says Reuters sports reporter Steve Keating. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
